title.newValue: Microsoft Purview | eDiscovery (Premium): List, collection, and jobs usability enhancement

description.newValue:
This batch of usability updates includes UX indication of case format, list page title, description, empty/error state improvement, addition of job duration time, and additional collection-related enhancements such as including review set name in collection detail and ability to save collection in its draft state.
GA date: November CY2022
